Change TV channel.cdl:
behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control) # Temporarily take the remote control in hand
        achieve close(remote_control, tv)  # Ensure the remote control is close to the TV
        achieve is_off(remote_control)     # Ensure the remote is off to start with
        touch(remote_control)              # Touch the remote to use it
Change TV channel.source_sub_task: 2. Use the remote control to turn on the TV.

behavior locate_remote(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve visited(remote_control)
        # The remote control has been found and visited

behavior locate_the_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve visited(remote_control)
        # Ensure the remote control is located

behavior sit_on_couch(couch:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, couch)

behavior sit_on_couch_now(couch:item):
    # Use a learned behavior to sit on the couch
    body:
        sit_on_couch(couch)
Change TV channel.source_sub_task: 1. Find a couch and sit on it.

Clean the bathroom.cdl:
behavior wipe_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        scrub(sink) # Wipe the sink with the available tools

behavior clean_and_fill_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        scrub(sink)
        # Scrub the sink to clean it
        
        achieve clean(sink)
        # Ensure the sink is clean

        achieve has_water(sink)
        # Fill the sink with water

behavior add_soap_to_sink(sink:item, soap:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(soap, sink)
Clean the bathroom.source_sub_task: 3. Add soap to the water in the sink.

Clean the bathroom.cdl:
behavior identify_bathroom_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        achieve is_sink(sink)
        # Determine that the item is indeed a sink after the inspection

Cook some food.cdl:
behavior rinse_vegetable(vegetable:item, sink:item):
    # Behavior to rinse vegetables in the sink
    body:
        achieve inside(vegetable, sink)
        if is_near_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            rinse(vegetable)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        else:
            rinse(vegetable)
Cook some food.source_sub_task: 2. Put the selected vegetables in a pot with water.

Cook some food.cdl:
behavior place_vegetable_in_pot(vegetable:item, pot:item):
    # Behavior to place vegetables in a pot
    body:
        achieve inside(vegetable, pot)
Cook some food.source_sub_task: 2. Put the selected vegetables in a pot with water.

Cook some food.cdl:
behavior move_pot_to_stove(pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        achieve on(pot, stove)  # Place the pot on the stove
Cook some food.source_sub_task: 2. Boil the vegetables on the stove.

Cook some food.cdl:
behavior boil_vegetables_in_pot_on_stove(pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(pot) # Ensure the pot has water
        achieve is_on(stove) # Turn on the stove to boil vegetables
Cook some food.source_sub_task: 2. Boil the vegetables on the stove.
